alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 9:53PM CDT until September 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Canyon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Armstrong and southeastern Randall Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
